vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract with Walker Bright PC for continued legal representation to Dallas Firefighter Brad Alan Cox in connection with the lawsuit styled Kyle Vess v. City of Dallas and Brad Alan Cox, Civil Action No. 3:21-CV-1764-D - Not to exceed $50,000.00, from $100,000.00 to $150,000.00 - Financing:  Liability Reserve Fund
